Scott Bennett has a fix for this and will be posting the patch.
I don't think we can squeeze it into 3.3 - can go into 3.3.1.
I would also suggest trying RC3 or RC4.

Created an attachment (id=72033)
NullPointerException - Update eclipse without set proxy

When ever the update site could not be read, either because the URL was invalid or when the network connection was down, the input stream would be NULL, however the wrapper class was still created.  This returned an instantiated wrapper class for the input stream, but the contents of the wrapper class was invalid.  Any time the wrapper class was used, a Null Pointer Exception was thrown.
Was this patch included in some release/branch? The issue is still marked as new.
